# Exam

The final exam is a 20 question online test to evaluate your understanding of fundamental R principles.  This exam is found at [http://ec2-34-200-213-225.compute-1.amazonaws.com/shiny/rstudio/exam](http://ec2-34-200-213-225.compute-1.amazonaws.com/shiny/rstudio/exam).

You must attain a 70% on this exam.
